Activities

In search of extreme experiences or replenishing moments amongst nature? We cater the activities to you and your families desire. Enjoy of full day trek, a guided hikes or enjoy a ballade with mules. Read feedback from our guests to get a real sense of what lies ahead.

Enjoy sumptuous traditional Berber dishes prepared with fresh ingredients sourced from local farmers and local markets, which will leave your palate satisfied.
